description:
Felix Louis-Claude Mont d`or (フェリクス・ ルイ＝クロード・モンドール Ferikusu Rui-Kurōdo Mondōru), also known by his stage name, "FELIX", is the vocalist of the band Fantôme Iris.
The invincible king hailing from France. His attractive figure and proficiency in foreign languages are due to him being born into an aristocratic family back in France. He is a free-spirited lad who loves beautiful things. What`s more, he possesses superior intellect as well as keen senses. Ignoring what people say about him, and the peculiar way he does things, he gives off the impression that he`s human just like everyone else.
His FELIX persona is a vampire lord who aims to build a kingdom where humans and vampires can co-exist.
name: Felix Louis-Claude Mont d`or
